blog.init()

So, I finally have a blog!

Hello World

  • I have been meaning to make a blog for several years. Whether it’s to practice writing, disseminate ideas, or share intuitions, I’ve always thought it would be cool to have a blog. And now, I finally do!
  • I plan on using this blog for several purposes. First, to write simple intuition-sharing posts for my students at HEROES Academy. Second, to practice writing for a wider audience. Being good at technical writing is like any skill: it gets better with quality practice.
made by brian mcmahan
